programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends(n)

programme.desc: A supermodel is kidnapped and imprisoned in a cell by an obsessed psychopath, then subjected to horrific mental and physical torture in this controversial horror film starring Elisha Cuthbert and Pruitt Taylor Vince, directed by Roland Joffe(n)

programme.desc: A bumbling deputy (Larry the Cable Guy) mistakes a federal witness for a kidnapping victim and takes her into "protective custody," thereby incurring the wrath of the FBI and a slew of unsavory criminals. Jenny McCarthy costars in this wacky comedy with Peter Stormare, Eric Roberts, Ivana Milicevic, Yaphet Kotto (as the same character he played in "Midnight Run") and Joe Mantegna(n)

programme.title: Big Significant Things

programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity(n)

programme.title: Zero Days
programme.desc: Documentary from Oscar-winning filmmaker Alex Gibney that explores the phenomenon of Stuxnet, a self-replicating computer virus discovered in 2010 that was allegedly commissioned by the US and Israeli governments to sabotage Iran's nuclear program that opened up a Pandora's box of cyber warfare(n)

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)(n)

programme.title: Permanent Midnight
programme.desc: Ben Stiller gives the performance of a lifetime in this searing, dark-humored drama based on the autobiography by Jerry Stahl. A hardcore heroin addict, Stahl nevertheless finds success as a writer for an insipid network television series and love with a gorgeous movie executive (Elizabeth Hurley), then proceeds to blow it all in the quest to maintain his habit. Owen Wilson costars in this chilling cautionary tale(n)

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver(n)

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson stars as a cop who asserts his own code of justice, blurring the lines between right and wrong, but when he gets caught on tape beating a suspect, he finds himself caught in a downwards emotional spiral, amidst a corruption scandal. programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar(n)

programme.title: London Town

programme.title: Don Jon

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife(n)

programme.title: 11 Blocks

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect(n)

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift

Eric Dane, Susan May Pratt, Ali Hillis and Niklaus Lange star in this taut thriller(n)

programme.title: Casual Sex?
programme.desc: Lea Thompson and Victoria Jackson star in a first-rate sex comedy about two women looking for love at a health resort and confronting the changing sexual attitudes of society. Andrew Dice Clay also stars(n)

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two tormented teen-rejects create the perfect woman with their computer, and a little bit of magic. Soon, their willing sex goddess helps them boost their popularity and even the score against the cool cliques at school(n)

The story follows the conflicts faced by Randy "Pink" Floyd, Mitch Kramer, Sabrina, Slater, Mike, and Wooderson. When the day dawns on the football field where several of them have gathered, the future might look bleak, but not totally without hope. Like it or not, the forced environment and resultant camaraderie that school has created for them is the closest thing they've known to home during these "best years" of their lives(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: A group of aid workers tries to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone as humor, drama, emotion, routine and danger all fit into one perfect day. Stars Benicio Del Toro and Tim Robbins(n)

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller(n)

programme.title: Andrew Santino: Home Field Advantage
programme.desc: Half Mick, half WOP, hard-headed comedian Andrew Santino returns to his Chicago hometown for a stand-up special with the authentic taste of a city made of Italian beef, Old Style and deep dish. Shot at the historic Vic Theater, Santino touches on everything from growing up thinking he was black and a disgust with bachelorette parties, to his bouts with severe acne and male porn stars envy(n)

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two tormented teen-rejects create the perfect woman with their computer, and a little bit of magic. Soon, their willing sex goddess helps them boost their popularity and even the score against the cool cliques at school(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: 7/14/2017
programme.desc: The critically acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series, "ShoBox: The New Generation" returns with a stacked slate of up and coming prospects determined to fight for a world title, featuring super lightweight Keenan Smith (11-0, 5 KOs), super lightweight Kenneth Sims (12-0, 4 KOs), bantamweight Glenn Dezurn (9-0, 6 KOs) and super bantamweight Joshua Greer (13-1-1, 5 KOs) all in separate bouts

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper

programme.desc: Academy Award winner, Denzel Washington, is Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer whose dreams are destroyed when he's wrongfully accused of murder. Carter is sentenced to three life terms in prison, where he decides to channel his frustration and despair by writing his own story from his cell. A teenager reads the autobiography and begins corresponding with him. Convinced of Carter's innocence, the teen enlists his social activist guardians to mount a full-time campaign to prove the truth and get Carter released

programme.title: The Ghost Writer

Olivia Williams costars in this tense thriller from director Roman Polanski

programme.title: Steve McQueen: The Man & Le Mans

programme.title: Transporter 3

programme.title: Rampart

programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah

Stars Willem Dafoe(n)

programme.title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen
programme.desc: A legendary Chinese hero, believed dead, returns to Shanghai in disguise and uses nefarious tactics to infiltrate a criminal empire and employs his martial arts skills to seek justice(n)

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal the story of Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and offering access to his daily experiences, his lifelong inspirations and the battle with his greatest personal challenge yet(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star(n)

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: Willard Stiles (Bruce Davison) is a young man who lives alone with his mother. His boss is a vulgar, cruel man who is working Willard to death at his factory job. Lonely, depressed and isolated, Willard is on the verge of a breakdown when he makes a new friend: Ben, one of the many rats who live in his dilapidated home. Not only can Willard communicate with the rodent, but he can actually command him to do his bidding. Using Ben and his friends as instruments of retaliation, Willard commands his pets to carry out his vengeance(n)

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend(n)

programme.title: Blackway

But when one of the hired hands is accidentally killed during the charade, he's forced to actually save her life while not revealing that it's been a ruse all along(n)

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star(n)

programme.title: Southpaw

But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two ordinary inner-city kids who chase the dream of professional basketball glory. Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: When Time Expires
programme.desc: If futuristic time traveler Richard Grieco fails to place a quarter in a parking meter at precisely the right moment, a series of chain reactions will ultimately result in the destruction of Earth in this sci-fi action thriller costarring Chad Everett and Mark Hamill

programme.title: Jesus Town, U.S.A.
programme.desc: Comedic documentary about a small Oklahoma town and their ambitious yearly theatrical endeavor: staging the passion play with over 100 cast members to the backdrop of a bizarre reproduction of Jerusalem built in the foothills of the Wichita mountains. Despite being an 88-year-old tradition, the play is struggling to find an audience and the young man who plays the role of Jesus has a secret revelation that could change everything

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Split Persona
programme.desc: The bond between twin sisters starts to fray when their mother starts showing signs of suicidal depression. Still, they need each other - but have they grown too far apart? Directed by Bradley Rust Gray. Written by Mayraleeh Nelson

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life(n)

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Tears and Tortillas
programme.desc: A Mexican grandmother is miraculously reunited with a long-lost love while making tortillas in this charming short from filmmaker Xochitl Dorsey(n)

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder(n)

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time(n)

programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book(n)

programme.title: D2: The Mighty Ducks
programme.desc: Emilio Estevez returns as hockey coach Gordon Bombay in this fun-filled family sequel. Sidelined by a knee injury, Gordon is offered a chance to coach the USA's team at the Goodwill Games in Los Angeles, but his head is quickly turned by lucrative endorsement deals and the good life on the left coast. Kathryn Erbe and Michael Tucker costar(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship(n)

programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film(n)

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Iris Rainer Dart, BEACHES chronicles the 30-year oil-and-water friendship between free-spirited Bronx Jew CC Bloom (Bette Midler) and uptight San Francisco WASP Hillary Essex (Barbara Hershey). The two meet as children and are reunited in the 1960s, when CC is a struggling singer and Hillary is trying to break free from her staid upbringing by becoming an activist. The two ladies room together, then fall out when both are attracted to the same man - off-Broadway producer John Pierce (John Heard)(n)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn(n)

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as a professional assassin sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb where his ten-year high school reunion is also taking place. There, he must fend off federal agents, a rival assassin, and fulfill a contract to kill, all while trying to win back with his former sweetheart. Also stars Minnie Driver and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: It Runs in the Family (2003)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and his legendary actor father Kirk Douglas team up on-screen for the first time with this comedy about a successful businessman whose midlife crisis inspires him to reach out to several generations of his family, with decidedly comic results. Bernadette Peters costars

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: In an Academy Award® nominated role, Charlotte Rampling stars as a woman who finds out on her 45th wedding anniversary that her husband was once engaged to someone else

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: Prophet's Prey
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the shocking life of notorious cult leader Warren Jeffs, and the FLDS Church, who through brainwashing and abuse seized control of his followers' lives and an organization worth hundreds of millions of dollars. While Jeffs is currently serving a life sentence for his crimes, he still exerts total authority over his flock. Features unprecedented interviews with Church insiders and victims, exposing the nightmarish hell of unspeakable crimes that still continue to this day

programme.title: All or Nothing
programme.desc: Filmmaker Mike Leigh delivers another glimpse of British working-class life with a moving, humanistic tale capturing both the desperation and bittersweet humor of its subjects' lives. Phil (Timothy Spall), a scruffy cab driver, his common-law life Penny (Lesley Manville) and their two overweight children reside in one of South London's ubiquitous concrete housing developments. When an unexpected crisis descends upon Phil and Penny, they are forced to face and affirm some of life's timeless verities. "Richly satisfying" ("The Guardian")

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Casual Sex?
programme.desc: Lea Thompson and Victoria Jackson star in a first-rate sex comedy about two women looking for love at a health resort and confronting the changing sexual attitudes of society. Andrew Dice Clay also stars

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: In an Academy Award® nominated role, Charlotte Rampling stars as a woman who finds out on her 45th wedding anniversary that her husband was once engaged to someone else(n)

programme.title: Bride of the Wind
programme.desc: A century ago, Alma Schindler was the darling of Vienna's art world. She posed for Gustav Klimt; she married the city's greatest composer, Gustav Mahler and revolutionary architect Walter Gropius; she had a tumultuous affair with the expressionist painter Oskar Kokoschka and escaped Europe on the eve of WWII with author Franz Werfel. Long celebrated in legend, song and gossip, Alma's life is colorfully recreated in this sumptuous biography starring Sarah Wynter, Jonathan Pryce and Vincent Perez(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Dumas swashbuckler classic is a heady mix of swordplay, horseplay, palace intrigue and royal romance in the court of French King Louis XII. (cc)

programme.title: Remember My Name
programme.desc: Blues singer Alberta Hunter's score highlights a complex story of a blue-collar couple hounded by a mysterious stranger (Geraldine Chaplin). Anthony Perkins, Berry Berenson. Pike: Moses Gunn. Nudd: Jeff Goldblum. Jeff: Timothy Thomerson. (cc)

programme.title: Cria Cuervos
programme.desc: A haunting study of a girl's traumatic childhood

programme.desc: Italian director Bernardo Bertolucci discusses Charles Chaplin's 1952 film “Limelight,” about a washed-up comic (Chaplin) who sacrifices all for the career of a young ballerina (Claire Bloom). (repeat)

programme.title: Vampyr
programme.desc: Eerily frightmarish horror classic tells the tale of a traveler who alights in a small village and experiences a number of mysterious, strange occurrences, only to discover the place is lorded over by an aged female vampire

programme.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
programme.desc: In this silent classic, John Barrymore scored one of his greatest screen successes as the dual personality created by Robert Louis Stevenson

programme.title: The Wasp Woman
programme.desc: A rejuvenating beauty treatment made from insect enzymes has unexpected side effects for an aging and vain cosmetics executive, who demanded to be the test subject for the new product. (cc)

programme.title: The Wolf Man
programme.desc: Lon Chaney Jr. plays the title role in this familiar Jekyll-and-Hyde tale about the plight of a man bitten by a werewolf. Evelyn Ankers, Ralph Bellamy. John: Claude Rains. Bela: Bela Lugosi. Lloyd: Warren Williams. Maleva: Maria Ouspenskaya. Directed by George Waggner. (cc)

programme.title: The Reptile
programme.desc: A fanged creature, half-human and half-snake, terrorizes a remote village. Jennifer Daniel. Harry: Ray Barrett. Ann: Jacqueline Pearce. Dr. Franklin: Noel Willman. Michael: Tom Bailey. John Gilling directed

programme.title: The Green Slime
programme.desc: Astronauts on a space station are plagued by a mysterious jellylike substance that clings to their backs, then turns into tentacled, red-eyed creatures that kill their victims. (cc)

programme.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
programme.desc: A vain Victorian man fantastically transfers his mortality onto a painting of himself, which proceeds to age for him, while he remains young and handsome. But as his visage remains beautifully preserved, his heart and soul decay. An adaptation of the Oscar Wilde novel. Angela Lansbury was nominated for a Best Supporting Actress Oscar as a jilted dance-hall performer. (cc)

programme.title: From Beyond the Grave
programme.desc: A quartet of horror tales centered on an eerie antique shop. Donald Pleasence, Margaret Leighton, David Warner, Ian Carmichael, Peter Cushing, Diana Dors, Ian Bannen, Lesley-Anne Down. Directed by Kevin Connor. (cc)

programme.title: Stephen King's 'Cat's Eye'

programme.desc: Part 1 of two. Michael and Jay react predictably (which is to say not at all well) to the news that Jr. has impregnated his girlfriend, Vanessa. But Michael is determined to make a man of his son. “I've got only nine months to take him from dummy to daddy,” he tells Jay. “I've got to teach him that there's no free ride.” First, he gives him a job at his trucking company. Brooklyn Sudano joins the cast as Vanessa (taking over from Megan Good). Tony: Andrew McFarlane. Franklin: Noah Gray-Cabey. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: A golfing buddy (David Alan Grier) of Michael's turns him on to a hair-growth pill, and Jay insists that she and Michael see an estate planner. (These two storylines are connected.) programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jr. learns what it means to be the boss's son when he begins working at Kyle Trucking. Meanwhile, Claire's been spending a lot of time in a homework chat room, so much that Michael wonders just what homework she's doing. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay decides to go back to college and get her psychology degree. Michael is opposed, of course. He says it will disrupt the house and it does: Jay psychoanalyzes everybody. Meanwhile, Jay gives Jr. his baby crib for his own baby, but his friends John and Mike (Damon Wayans Jr., Michael Wayans) have their own plans for it. (repeat)

programme.desc: Jr. has been getting friendly with a coworker named Larry (Sean Whalen), who ups the friendship ante considerably when his grandmother dies. Meanwhile, Claire sprains her ankle tripping over Kady's skateboard, so Michael makes Kady Claire's “personal assistant.” Jr.: George O. Gore II. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Vanessa (Brooklyn Sudano) has her ultrasound, but doesn't want to know the baby's sex. Neither does Jr. Only Michael wants to know. Meanwhile, Kady is enamored of a young dancer named Smilin' Willie (Elliot Cho). This upsets not only Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey), but Claire as well. It seems that Willie has a crush on her, and won't leave her alone. Jasmine: Ella Joyce. Calvin: Rasta. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: After her wild bachelorette party, Fancy's sorority sister Janine wakes up next to the stripper---Jamie. Adam: Tiny Lister Jr. Adam No. 2: Rodney Van Johnson. Kyra: Michelle Anne Johnson. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Jamie is much too fast to buy a little red Corvette off the street, and when the car turns out to be hot he and Braxton land in jail with prisoners planning to tunnel to freedom. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. Tonya: Kira Arne. Helen: Ellia English. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Edwina DuBois, a gal pal of Helen's, tries to show Jamie the ways of the casting couch, while teaching an acting seminar at the hotel. Garcelle Beauvais, Steve Whit, Ellia English. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Jamie tries to maintain control after the Westside Connection (Ice Cube, Mack-10, W.C.) checks in with a huge entourage and a wad of cash. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. Rev. Alize: Jamie Foxx. Helen: Ellia English. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: In the second-season premiere, Ryan steps up as boss after learning his staff's taking advantage of him. Later, Kat betrays the shop in order to further her brand; and Don's old flame from college resurfaces, claiming he's the father of her child. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.sub-title: Prison on the Outside, Party on the Inside
programme.desc: Ryan hires a new tattoo artist, causing animosity among the staff. Later, a fight breaks out after Kat learns Charmaine threw out her personal items; Don takes a paternity test; and Van's released from boot camp. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Don's paternity-test results lead him on a downward spiral; Ryan gets back in the dating scene; and Van reunites with his daughter after four months. Later, Danielle's birthday party takes a turn for the worse when Ashley and her friends crash the event and go after Charmaine. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Van returns to work at 9 Mag, but he's angry that the shop has changed. Later, Charmaine faces the consequences of quitting her corporate job; Ashley confronts Don about having a child with another woman; and Ryan introduces yet another tattoo artist to the shop. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew Chicago
programme.desc: A reality series that follows the lives of a group of friends who work at a popular tattoo parlor in Chicago. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew Chicago
programme.desc: A reality series that follows the lives of a group of friends who work at a popular tattoo parlor in Chicago. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Don learns life-shattering news; Charmaine auditions to be a radio DJ to make some extra cash; and Phor records a song about peace with a famous rapper following a deadly weekend in Chicago. Later, Ryan makes a decision about Cobra's future at 9 Mag in light of her questionable behavior. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Don moves up his wedding date in light of his looming jail sentence; Kat's first art show goes south when Phor shows up with a date; and Van reveals to his girlfriend that he's not a monogamist. Later, Phor's girlfriend confronts Kat about her attitude at a 9 Mag party. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: The crew travel to the Dominican Republic for Don's wedding. Later, Kat confronts Phor about his infidelity; Van's threesome goes awry when his girlfriend brings a surprise guest; and Don jeopardizes his marriage after flirting with a stripper. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: In the Season 2 finale, Ashley arrives in the Dominican Republic for her wedding and asks her brother to spy on Don's bachelor party. Later, Terrence gives Danielle an ultimatum; and Ashley threatens to call off the big day after seeing risqué pictures from the bachelor party. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: In the third-season premiere, Ray J and Princess' wedding plans are thrown off track. Later, Moniece and Brandi encounter each other; Nikki discovers Fizz has been hiding a secret; and someone from Willie's past visits Shanda. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: A woman from Willie's past shows up, causing a rift in his marriage. Later, Ray and Princess address the prenup controversy; Moniece stirs up trouble; and Masika struggles with paternity issues. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: A1 and Lyrica's opinionated mothers threaten their relationship; and Princess confronts Moniece. Later, Brandi's plan to hide a secret from Max backfires. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: A1 and Lyrica try to ease the tension between their mothers before the wedding. Later, Masika hangs out with Fetty Wap; Max's anger toward Brandi persists after her secret is discovered; and Nikki's involved in a new romance. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay's training hard to run a marathon; Michael not so hard ("I'm on my regimen---it's called the eat, drink and be merry regimen"). Meanwhile, Tony (Andrew McFarlane) is feeling incredibly guilty because he finds Clare "incredibly sexy." (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael and Jay go out for the evening without reciting “the rules” to Claire. That means it's party time, and the party animal turns out to be Claire's usually pious boyfriend Tony (Andrew McFarlane). (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: E Street Band saxman Clarence Clemons guests as a jazz performer who went to school with Michael, who suddenly claims he's a pianist (albeit a rusty one). He'll get a chance to show it. Meanwhile, Kady and Franklin's sister Aretha are vying to be lead singer in Franklin's band, so the young man has a choice to make. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.sub-title: The Lady Is Not a Tramp
programme.desc: Tony (Andrew McFarlane) returns from a “purification exile” that followed his drunk-and-naked escapade, and Michael finds condoms in Claire's backpack. Naturally, he suspects linkage. Meanwhile, Jr. and Vanessa (Brooklyn Sudano) get a dog---a male they name “Lady”---as a “dress rehearsal” for parenthood. Jr. will soon demonstrate just how much rehearsal he'll need. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.sub-title: Step Up to Get Beat Down
programme.desc: A chance to sing on the radio lands Jamie a contract with record mogul Sweet and Low (Tony Cox), but the deal comes up a little short. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. Junior: Garrett Morris. Helen: Ellia English. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: When Jamie and Braxton are held captive in a bank robbery gone awry, Fancy's boyfriend (Kristoff St. John), a hostage negotiator, must plead for their release. Mary Jane: Yvette Wilson. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Tyrone Koppel: Jamie Foxx. Junior: Garrett Morris. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.sub-title: I've Fallen and I Won't Get Up
programme.desc: A hotel guest (Kelly Coffield) scams a free room after claiming to have fallen on a wet lobby floor---and the Kings land in court. Judge Jackson: Ruth Buzzi. Marsha Darden: Cristine Rose. Junior: Garrett Morris. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.sub-title: Save the Drama for Your Mama
programme.desc: Jamie's mother (Gladys Knight) arrives for a visit just as her "Boompsy" is planning a benefit for Nelson's shelter. But the reunion turns sour when mom must choose between her career and her son. Ellia English, Orlando Brown. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.sub-title: I Know Why the Caged Bird Screams
programme.desc: Will and Jazz steal a statue from a rival school, whose team retaliates by kidnapping ULA's lucky charm---Carlton (Alfonso Ribeiro), the strutting peacock mascot. Coach Kelly: Jeff Doucette. Amanda: Rana Kirkland. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.sub-title: When You Hit upon a Star
programme.desc: Will (Will Smith) is a no-show at his own surprise birthday party and takes off with a celebrity (Stacy Dash) who he thinks has the hots for him. Ian: David Sterry. Rick: Alan Smith. Philip: James Avery. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: A job as a car salesman fattens Will's wallet and prompts him to quit college. Pete: Robert Guillaume. Vy: Vernee Watson-Johnson. Harrison: Mel Johnson Jr. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 13)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Rank the Prank
programme.desc: Rank The Prank - pranking Hollywood style! Today our pesky pranksters Koala Bunnies (Svetlana and Neptune) and Prank Bosses (James and Caiden) join forces with prosthetics and make-up wiz CJ Goldman and SFX guru Andy Antoine to stage the biggest and best PUBLIC PRANKS on an unsuspecting public. Teams summon wizards and aliens on a busy city street corner and it's all hands on deck to rig the hidden cameras and special effects required to bring our Pranksters' ideas to life! But which team will impress our prank-loving panel of 'Ranksters' to win the chance to stage a mind blowing MEGA PRANK on a 'target' of their choice? Get ready for some gut-busting reactions when Svetlana and Neptune's 'Blizzard-ade' faces off with James and Caiden's 'Alien Crash Landing'. Ranksters ... the choice is yours. And for the winning team, CJ and Andy have planned the ultimate mega prank with the wackiest obstacle course challenge ever created! Exploding cakes, spraying cream and a crazed clown aren't the only obstacles to avoid on this course. If the 'target' is going to make it through, he'll have to dodge a grizzly bear too! It's one huge bear and one hilarious MEGA PRANK!(n)
